examples: I haven't seen him in forever !
It took me forever to make up my mind.
Don't spend forever on the phone!
She should've been here five forevers ago!

definitions.definition: A mythical time in the future that will never come.
examples: Sure, I'd be happy to meet with you on the 12th of forever .

main_definition: ( countable , colloquial ) An extremely long time.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , colloquial or poetic ) A mythical time in the future that will never come.
